title: How to Configure Row Expansion in a Data Table
description: In this article, you will learn how to configure row expansion on a data table. To use the row expansion feature, you create a data table and a partial; you configure the partial to contain related information of the table item. A partial is a semi page which is a reusable object, and a data table is a data widget configured as a variable. You add page params in the partial page and bind it through the data table settings.
